programme.title: Wild Oman: Wonder of Arabia S1 Ep2
programme.desc: The Sultanate of Oman is the Middle East's best kept secret. It is a corner of Arabia of unparalleled beauty and unexpected landscapes. It's a land swept by incredible winds that nourish some of the most productive ecosystems of our planet inhabited by extraordinary creatures and some of the rarest animals of our Planet - the Arabian Sea Humpback Whale, Loggerhead Turtle and Arabian Wolf - as well as other incredible species such as the Arabian Chameleon, Caracal and Egyptian Vulture.

programme.title: Wild Oman: Wonder of Arabia S1 Ep2
programme.desc: The Sultanate of Oman is the Middle East's best kept secret. It is a corner of Arabia of unparalleled beauty and unexpected landscapes. It's a land swept by incredible winds that nourish some of the most productive ecosystems of our planet inhabited by extraordinary creatures and some of the rarest animals of our Planet - the Arabian Sea Humpback Whale, Loggerhead Turtle and Arabian Wolf - as well as other incredible species such as the Arabian Chameleon, Caracal and Egyptian Vulture.

programme.title: South Korea with Alexander Armstrong S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Alexander visits the awesome Gyeongbokgung Palace, picks something up at the vast Yangnyeongsi herbal market, and even takes a look at the lucrative culture of fortune-telling.

programme.title: Spectacular Earth S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Megawave - Nazaré in Portugal is the site of the biggest ocean waves ever recorded on Earth. To understand what creates these monsters, we use specialist jet-ski cameras to ride the waves.

programme.title: Inside the Factory S7 Ep1
programme.desc: Diggers - Gregg Wallace and Cherry Healey get special access to a factory that makes as many as a hundred iconic yellow diggers every single day.

programme.title: Seven Worlds, One Planet S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Asia - The latest series from the BBC and Sir David Attenborough explores the continent of Asia and the rarely-observed inhabitants that roam the mountains, deserts and jungles.

programme.title: Expedition with Steve Backshall S2 Ep6
programme.desc: Expedition Unseen - Steve takes on four entirely new adventures to remote parts of the planet - including Saudi Arabia, Gabon and Mexico - in search of precious natural wonders.

programme.desc: Diggers - Gregg Wallace and Cherry Healey get special access to a factory that makes as many as a hundred iconic yellow diggers every single day.

programme.desc: Alexander visits the awesome Gyeongbokgung Palace, picks something up at the vast Yangnyeongsi herbal market, and even takes a look at the lucrative culture of fortune-telling.

programme.title: Spectacular Earth S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Megawave - Nazaré in Portugal is the site of the biggest ocean waves ever recorded on Earth. To understand what creates these monsters, we use specialist jet-ski cameras to ride the waves.

programme.title: Inside the Factory S7 Ep2
programme.desc: Trains - Gregg gets special access to learn how the ultimate train is made: a huge 187-tonne, five-carriage electric train. Meanwhile, Cherry Healey visits an HS2 construction site.

programme.title: Wild Japan S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Southwest Islands - Stories of isolation, unique wildlife and unsolved mysteries surround a chain of Japanese islands which stretch towards the tropics - where all life is influenced by the power of the sea.

programme.title: Coast New Zealand S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Fiordland - Fiordland is another beautiful area of New Zealand, but it is also the emptiest, loneliest and most remote part of the country, a place Maori call Ata Whenua - the Shadow Land.

programme.title: Deadly Disasters S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Landslides - Using survivor testimony and fascinating expert insights, we examine three of the most terrifying mudslides in recent history: In California, Venezuela, and a small Welsh mining village of Aberfan, where a calamitous mudslide overtook an entire school of young children.

programme.title: Extreme Fishing with Robson Green S1 Ep3
programme.desc: South Africa - Robson is in South Africa on the trail of the incredible phenomenon known as the Sardine Run and has a close encounter with a shark.

programme.title: Rewilding 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Return of the European Bison - They are Europe’s biggest terrestrial mammals and the last wild bovine species on the continent. Once the European bison, also known as Wisent, roamed most of the old world, but, unlike its close relative on the other side of the Atlantic, it was hunted to complete extinction by the early 20th century. Only by ambitious rewilding undertakings is it nowadays possible to see these fascinating animals in their natural habitats again.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Hauraki Gulf/ Te Moananui a Toi - Take a deep dive into the teeming waters of the Hauraki Gulf, near Auckland, New Zealand, and explore a true paradise for ocean creatures. Catch a glimpse of a stealthy manta ray, enjoy dolphin antics, and admire a kaleidoscope of tropical fish.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Mekong 1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Journey Begins - The source of the Mekong River is high up in the Tibetan plateau, from there it flows into Yunnan Province, China, where our journey begins. Even though Yunnan occupies less than 4% of China’s land, it is home to over half of its birds and mammals.

programme.title: Wild Castles 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Heidelberg - Explore beautiful Heidelberg Castle whose ruins stand in imposing wonder beside the river Neckar in Western Germany. Surrounded by a protected nature reserve, the castle is home to birds of prey and acts as a spawning ground for nearby amphibians.

programme.title: Wild Castles 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Carcassonne - Travel to a centuries-old French fortress, home to some of history's greatest empires. Carcassone, once a center of wealth and culture, is now a haven for wildlife. Birds, wild boar, and armies of insects endure in its bountiful surroundings.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Fugitive Giants - With elephant numbers on the rise, so too are the conflicts Ol Pejeta has to deal with, like a gang of crop-raiding Pachyderms. The order is given to detusk three of the problem animals, but first the team will have to remove a collar from a blind elephant.

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Ngorongoro - Explores the Ngorogoro’s highlands and caldera on the edge of the Serengeti. The caldera is a wildlife haven that some have called a modern day Eden because of the density and diversity of its wildlife. That includes some of the last of Africa’s “tuskers.”

programme.title: Coastal Africa 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Algoa Bay: Last Refuge of the African Penguin - The population of African penguins in Southern Africa is on the decline, but the charismatic species has found a stronghold on two islands in Algoa Bay. This is the story of the penguins’ daily struggle to raise families in an unforgiving and hostile environment.

programme.title: Arctic Secrets 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Wild Seas - On the north-east coast of Baffin Island, in Canada’s Arctic, lies Ninginganiq, a blustery wilderness where only the intrepid travel. In fall, it is so dangerous that even seasoned Inuit sailors keep away.

programme.title: Rewilding 1 Ep1

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Tides of Sweetwater - A look at the plight of chimpanzees that survive the bush meat trade to become captive animals. At the same time, we look at the reintroduction of colobus monkeys into the Ewaso river area of Ol Pejeta.

programme.title: Arctic Secrets 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Wild Seas - On the north-east coast of Baffin Island, in Canada’s Arctic, lies Ninginganiq, a blustery wilderness where only the intrepid travel. In fall, it is so dangerous that even seasoned Inuit sailors keep away.

programme.title: Wild Castles 1 Ep1

programme.title: Wild Castles 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Carcassonne - Travel to a centuries-old French fortress, home to some of history's greatest empires. Carcassone, once a center of wealth and culture, is now a haven for wildlife. Birds, wild boar, and armies of insects endure in its bountiful surroundings.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Village Raiders - Leopard problems plague the community as hunger-ravaged predators roam dangerously close to nearby villages. The team at Ol Pejeta need to safely snare a leopard and relocate it for the good of man and beast.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 1 Ep7
programme.desc: Relentless Sun - A once-in-a-generation drought has sucked all the moisture from surrounding rivers and the conservation team is struggling to keep up with the swath of thirsty creatures. While some animals succumb to dehydration, the team must concentrate its efforts on a particularly vulnerable - and dangerous - water buffalo.

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Snows of Kilimanjaro - Mt. Kilimanjaro is the highest freestanding peak in Africa, it has five separate climatic zones. Jean Du Plessis is making his first climb to the peak. His mission is to see whether climate change is affecting the snow on the top of the mountain.

programme.title: Arabian Inferno 1 Ep1
programme.desc: When the Rain Comes - The Arabian landscape is a virtually waterless desert where rain scarcely falls and animals endure blistering temperatures. But for 3 months every year, a remote region on the south west coast undergoes an astonishing transformation… into a lush, verdant oasis.

programme.title: The Living Beach 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Australia - It’s a UNESCO World Heritage Site, the largest sand island on earth, and home to wild dingoes, six-foot sand-worms, and eucalyptus woodlands. Find out how everything lives happily together in a complex ecosystem built entirely upon sand.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Creature Comforts - This episode of Amazing Animal Friends features a troop of rescue center monkeys that have adopted a litter of stray kittens, a loyal dog helping a rescued raccoon overcome her fears, and an emu raised by Irish setters.

programme.title: Wild Castles 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Heidelberg - Explore beautiful Heidelberg Castle whose ruins stand in imposing wonder beside the river Neckar in Western Germany. Surrounded by a protected nature reserve, the castle is home to birds of prey and acts as a spawning ground for nearby amphibians.

programme.title: Wild Castles 1 Ep2

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 2 Ep3
programme.desc: Walking with a Pangolin - Crush a busy day with the team as they release rehabbed pythons, teach a pangolin how to hunt, and round up a troop of vervet monkeys. Search for a missing bird of prey with Dr. Charlotte, while Dr. Amanda helps a bushpig savaged by poachers’ dogs.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 2 Ep4
programme.desc: Tsiba's New Mum - Tackle an emergency when Dr. Amanda removes a sable antelope’s tracking collar, and see the animal-care team help a flea-riddled baby vervet monkey find a new mom. Free two orphaned serval cats and follow 20 yellow baboons into their new enclosure.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 1 Ep8
programme.desc: Bush Camps - Eco-tourism isn't just a background player in the operation of Ol Pejeta, it's the financial backbone that keeps the park operating. From comfortable camping to ultra-luxurious accommodation, the guests that stay at Ol Pejeta live among nature during their stay and they even assist in research and tracking park wildlife.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 1 Ep9
programme.desc: Girls of Oryx Plain - A baby rhino's mother is illegally shot and Ol Pejeta staff have to calm the wild baby. It's not ideal to separate the calf from her mother, but the situation is dire, and the calf will have to be hand-raised. Also, a look at a four-year-old captive rhino that went through the same thing and is now entering a new stage in life.

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Cradle of Mankind - Wildlife expert and safari guide Jean Du Plessis travels to Mahale Mountains National Park in the hopes of spending time with the wild chimpanzees that live in the forests of this remote and protected corner of Tanzania.

programme.title: Arabian Inferno 1 Ep2
programme.desc: In Cold Blood - It sometimes feels like mammals rule the world; there are well over 5,000 species, colonising every corner of the globe. But in Arabia there’s a different story – this is a land where reptiles rule.

programme.title: The Living Beach 1 Ep6
programme.desc: California - The beaches of California are some of the most beautiful in the world, but are they falling out of balance due to mankind’s effects on nature? What does it take for the magnificent fauna of the Pacific Coast to keep living… on the “living beach”?

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends 1 Ep6
programme.desc: To the Rescue - Meet more Amazing Animal Friends, including “ranch manager” Barclay, a Great Dane who happens to be a gifted horse whisperer. In Africa, a tiny marmoset called Thor has become obsessed with two young rescued mongooses.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 2 Ep3
programme.desc: Walking with a Pangolin - Crush a busy day with the team as they release rehabbed pythons, teach a pangolin how to hunt, and round up a troop of vervet monkeys. Search for a missing bird of prey with Dr. Charlotte, while Dr. Amanda helps a bushpig savaged by poachers’ dogs.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 Ep5
programme.desc: Rio the Giant River Otter Pup - Visit the last stronghold of the giant river otter in Brazil’s beautiful Pantanal wetland. Track pup Rio and his siblings as they test the waters, team up to evade a jaguar ambush, and become a cohesive family unit that hunts and thrives together.

programme.title: Turtle Beach
programme.desc: Turtle Beach - Locals call it the ‘arribada’, or ‘arrival’. The magical days and nights when tens of thousands of sea turtles come ashore in Costa Rica, to lay millions of eggs. In Turtle Beach, new discoveries abound, as Canadian naturalist and cameraman Hugo Kitching follows a team of international scientists on a groundbreaking expedition to uncover the mysteries of this rare phenomenon.

In Turtle Beach, new discoveries abound, as Canadian naturalist and cameraman Hugo Kitching follows a team of international scientists on a groundbreaking expedition to uncover the mysteries of this rare phenomenon.

programme.title: Donal's Asian Baking Adventure S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Mangwon - In Seoul Donal visits Mangwon market with TV Chef Wonil Lee for a history of Korean baking. He finds there are new cake, bread and confectionary businesses buzzing with excitement. While in Seoul he makes Black Sesame Scones with Chef Wonil.

programme.title: Grand Designs: House of the Year S7 Ep2
programme.desc: Incredible House Transformations - Kevin McCloud and the experts visit five homes that have undergone incredible transformations, from a Dutch barn and a factory reborn, to a library hidden within a former cowshed.

programme.title: My Unique B&B S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Ruben's Cob House - When 17-year-old Ruben told his parents, Helen and Tim, that he wanted to build a mud hut in their Oxfordshire garden as his A-level project, they had no idea how much work they would all have to put into it.

programme.title: My Unique B&B S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Julie and Toby's Castle Turret - Simon's team is in Warwickshire to turn a 200-year-old turret into a medieval-themed B&B. The tiny two-floored building may look like a turret on the outside, but on the inside it's a bland office.

programme.title: Eat Well For Less S7 Ep1
programme.desc: Gregg and Chris are in Windsor helping time-poor mum, Holly and sons Spencer and Fletcher, who rely on microwave ready meals. Can they convince Holly to cook from scratch in order to save for a much needed holiday?

programme.title: Rachel Khoo's Chocolat S1 Ep3
programme.desc: From Bean to Bar - Rachel explores chocolate's versatility. She mixes it with savoury in a polpette penne, and in Stockholm she learns about pairing drink with chocolate.

programme.desc: It's the final, and Gordon puts the remaining three businesses under scrutiny. Who will win his £150,000 investment and become his future food star?

programme.desc: Brothers - When Toby's ninja brothers try to get him to steal San Lorenzo's treasure, he must decide between them and his friendship with Puss.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep61
programme.desc: Pip's Playground - Pip is feeling bored and wants something new to play. Fifi has a brilliant idea and asks all the tots to help her build a playground for Pip as a surprise.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep62
programme.desc: Mud Sculptures - It has been raining and the garden is muddy. The tots decide to make mud sculptures. But what will they all do with the sculptures when they are finished?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep63
programme.desc: Stingo's Naughty Day - Stingo is bored and plays all manner of naughty tricks on the other tots. Fifi teaches Stingo that he will have more fun if he helps people rather than being mean to them.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep64
programme.desc: Shrinking Pip - The Tots are all measuring themselves. Pip hasn't grown much since he was last measured. How can he grow into a big strong gooseberry?

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep9
programme.desc: Why Do Spiders Build Webs? - The friends are having a tidying up day. Frightened Baa doesn't like spiders or their webs but Jess helps him to stop being scared by working out that Spiders build webs to catch their supper, and Baa feels re-assured and happy. Spiders are rather nice, rather clean and rather clever.

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep10
programme.desc: How Can We Bring The Outside Inside? - Poor Willow has a sore hoof and has to stay inside until it's better. She's really missing her orchard so Jess and Mimi are determined to bring something of the outside to Willow to cheer her up. A tree is too big and it's too late in the year for apples. Jess works out that they can make beautiful tree and leaf rubbings into a wonderful tree collage for the stable to remind Willow of her orchard.

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep11
programme.desc: What's My Favourite Thing About Spring? - Mimi has promised Jess a special surprise if he can work out what he likes best about the Spring… He finds out that there's blossom on the trees, fresh new grass, bright young flowers in the Springtime. But he decides his very favorite thing is the newly hatched very cute little baby birds which his friend Little Bird has been singing about all along.

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep12
programme.desc: How Can I Hide Without Being Found? - Willow is the best hide-and-seek finder! Jess is determined to work out a way of hiding without Willow finding him! A trip to the pond where he discovers that both Horace and Sammy Snail are camouflaged leads him to work out that he too can do the same to hide from Willow at last!

programme.title: Olivia Ep9
programme.desc: Olivia Claus - It's almost Christmas, and Olivia and Ian can't wait for Santa to come. But there's one thing that Santa can't bring – Olivia's lost toy, her beloved monkey Mathilda. Olivia imagines herself to be a Santa Claus who returns lost toys. On Christmas morning Olivia finds new gifts under the tree and Mathilda right under her nose.

programme.title: Olivia Ep10
programme.desc: Olivia Takes Ballet - Olivia is determined to dance just like the ballerinas she's seen in a ballet; the only thing she needs is a partner. Luckily, Uncle Garret (a professional football player) is visiting, and the two of them dance a surprisingly graceful pas de deux for Olivia's whole class.

programme.title: Olivia Ep11
programme.desc: Olivia And The Crystal Ball - While Olivia and her brothers play fortune teller, baby William accidentally breaks Dad's new bowling trophy, When a friendly police officer shows up at the door selling raffle tickets, Olivia is convinced that he's come for William, and she devises a scheme to keep William safe from the “arms of the law”.

programme.title: Olivia Ep12
programme.desc: Olivia Packs Up - Tired of having to share with her brother Ian, Olivia sets out on a trip around theblock in search of a place free from little brothers. She imagines herself crossing a vast desert by camel – which isn't all it's cracked up to be – and eventually decides that having a little brother might not be so bad after all.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep9
programme.desc: Why Monkeys Swing In The Trees - You see there was a time when Monkey used to play on the ground and he loved to wind up Crocodile. One day the Big Rains came and Monkey got stranded up the Mango Tree. Nasty Crocodile promised to take him to dry land…. But only in exchange for one thing…. His HEART! Monkey tricked Crocodile and when Crocodile found out that Monkey swapped his heart for a measley mango, he chased Monkey up a tree. From that day on Monkey swings in the trees keeping well clear of Crocodiles angry snaps! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep10
programme.desc: Why Tickbird Sits On Hippos Back - You see there was a time when Tickbird didn't sit on Hippo's back, infact they weren't friends at all! Tickbird was sick of Hippo splashing all the time. One day tiny Tickbird challenges big Hippo to a contest… who can drink the most water in a single gulp! Tickbird outwits Hippo by using the tides and from that day she is allowed to sit on Hippo's back and pick off all the yummy ticks she can eat! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep11
programme.desc: Why Frog Croaks - You see there was a time when Frog didn't croak. Frog sang like a bird… and the birds didn't like it. Birds were the masters of song and that's the way it should be! So the birds trick poor old Frog into a singing duel and sing and sing and sing… until poor old Frog's voice is reduced to a rebbit. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep12
programme.desc: Why Spider Has A Tiny Waist - You see there was a time when Spider didn't have a tiny waist. She was all big and round… and did she like her food! One day greedy Spider hears of Four Feasts in Tinga Tinga and she wanted to go to them all! So she spun four threads and attached them to various animals going to the feasts. But the Monkeys, Frog, Hippo and the Bees all set off in different directions – North, South, East and West – and Spider's thread soon runs out. EEeeek! The threads get tighter and tighter and tighter, making Spider's smaller and smaller and smaller! Luckily the threads break, but from that day on Spider has always had a tiny waist. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep33
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Cunning Combat of the Covert Camoflush - The campers' splat-tastic game of paintball is rather rudely interrupted by a foul and formidable fiend known only as Camoflush.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep34
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Bad Beat of the Blah Borelock - With fun in short supply, Harold and George persuade Krupp to dump the campers in the middle of the forest so they can learn to rough it.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep33
programme.desc: Escape From Krinkle's - Boss has an opportunity to get his old job back at Baby Corp;but to get the interview;he’ll need the playgroup babies to help him escape Marsha Krinkle’s super-safe Bubbeezee playroom. Tim nearly misses Kabob Day at school.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep34
programme.desc: Puppy Party! - Boss comes face to face with his old nemesis;Bug The Pug;after the playgroup parents decide to throw a Puppy Party. Staci creates a “No-Paperworkist” movement to avoid Buddy From HR’s constant paperwork.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep56
programme.desc: My Fair Demon - When a kind, gentle Demon with dreams of being evil emerges from the portal, Puss and the team do their best to teach the monster how to be bad

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep30
programme.desc: Dark Side of the Lagoon / Mr. Glittercakes - When Poppy drops DJ Suki’s prized party-making possession in the lagoon, she and her friends must go on a submarine adventure to the lagoon floor in order to find it./When Branch uses an excuse to avoid going to a party- that he has plans with his “friend” Mr. Glittercakes- Poppy calls him out. But to both Branch and Poppy’s surprise, it turns out Mr. Glittercakes is real! Who is the mysterious Troll, and why has he chosen to help Branch?

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep30
programme.desc: O Brother Where Aren't Thou? - Mort becomes jealous when King Julien's wish for a little brother finally comes true after his parents adopt a socially awkward Aye-Aye named Brodney.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep30
programme.desc: Lucky and the Two-Wheeled Terror - When Lucky and the PALs arrive home from the circus, they find that Maricela and her new bicycle have become the star attraction in Miradero

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep4
programme.desc: The Big New Mexico Pepper Hunt - When Odlulu challenges the Wanderers to win best chili (and a magic key) at the annual chili cook-off in Hatch, New Mexico, Whitebeard pulls out his old family recipe. The only problem is they don't have the most important ingredient -- a ghost pepper! They need to get a pepper and the key!

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep4
programme.desc: Show Dog, Show \ Keys to Victory - Tag can't wait to show off her car at the car show. But when Cheddar Biscuit wants to come along and pick up her clown friends along the way, Tag is wary that Cheddar Biscuit will steal her thunder. \ The Not Yet Cadets can't wait to watch Sam’s big race. But when Sam loses his car key, he challenges the Not Yet Cadets to race around town to find it.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep4
programme.desc: Gopher it! / A Glamping We Will Go - When a pesky gopher gets in the way of Fawna making her famous veggie stew, Niah learns to not let a bad experience, get in the way of doing good. / When the inexperienced Rona has to step in for Donna, the team makes sure everyone has the best camping trip ever.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep4
programme.desc: Where There's Smoke - After Magnus accuses Cutter of setting fires near the village that could hurt the sheep, the Riders have to put them out and find the real culprit.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep7
programme.desc: The Case Of The Little Lost Toy - Smartysaurus is delighted because a little clockwork duck has appeared at the DinoLab. No one knows where she belongs but Noddy is sure that her family must be missing her so he decides to investigate and find her home. Noddy uses all his skills of thinking, looking, listening and asking questions to find the home for the little duck. Things aren't helped by the little duck constantly rushing back to the Dinolab! What is going on? Clever Noddy realises that the little duck is the missing duckling from the new family of ducks at the Calm Farm and soon reunites her with her Mummy and sister. And Smartysaurus is happy too because she can visit her new little friend whenever she wants! Quack, quack Noddy!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep8
programme.desc: The Case Of Jumpy Revs - Something very strange is happening in Toyland. Lots of things seem to be jumping in a particular direction for no reason – Revs, Noddy's bell, Big Ear's spoons and kettle. What is going on? Noddy decides to investigate and help his best friend Revs who is very upset. Using his investigating kit and the WhoWhatWhere Tablet Noddy realises that everything that is jumping is metal! He follows the trail, together with bravely jumpy Revs, to DareDale's Pirate Bay where they find the Pirates on a treasure hunt with a big electronic magnet! Brave Noddy has to jump aboard the wildly careening galleon and turn off the magnet before disaster strikes. Well-done Noddy!

programme.desc: Farewell, General Sherwood / Zoom Boomer - After a memorial for a famous tree that has fallen, Archibald discovers that Sage has never cried and vows to help his brother get in touch with his emotions. / When Archibald wins the chance be shot from a cannon at the circus, he has no idea everyone in town is vying to be his plus one.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep4
programme.desc: Duchess - The Duchess seeks Artephius' soul for her spell collection, and it's up to Puss to protect him. It turns out that The Duchess and Artephius have a complicated relationship.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep65
programme.desc: Bumble's Special Lunch - Fifi has invited the other tots over to lunch but she is not very well. Bumble gamely steps in and offers to cook for her. What could possibly go wrong?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep66

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep67
programme.desc: Pirate Primrose - The tots are playing at pirates, all except Primrose, who is being a princess, naturally. But guess which tot has the best pirating skills when they are needed

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep68
programme.desc: Primrose Loses It - Primrose has broken her new necklace and lost the beads. She is unconsolable. Violet holds a make and do party to replace the necklace

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep13
programme.desc: Why Do Bees Make Honey? - Mimi's munching some honey sandwiches at the Hutch when Jess comes to visit. She shows him the lovely pots of honey she has and he wonders why bees need to make it. He thinks maybe Jess wonders if it might be used as glue but when Horace singing him a groovy song about HOW honey is made, Jess has an idea that it might be used as food during the winter when there's no pollen..

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep14
programme.desc: When Will The Owl Go Hooooo!? - Jess is excited to tell the children at home all about the Owl he heard Hoo Hoo'ing in the night and he wants to let us hear it. He tries everything he can think of to get the Owl to hoot until he works out that it was nightime when he last heard the owl, so it he waits til it's night again we might just all get to hear the lovely sound of the Owl.

programme.desc: Nature Trail - Peppa and her family are driving out to the countryside to go for a walk in the woods. Peppa and George discover trails of footprints left by little birds and ants.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep240
programme.desc: Pretend Friend - Suzy Sheep has made up a pretend friend called “Leo Lion”. Peppa cannot see Leo but Suzy says that Leo likes roaring and dressing up. Peppa decides that now she can see Leo. Even Mummy and Daddy Pig play along. But George feels a bit left out.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep241
programme.desc: Pen Pal - Peppa has a French pen pal, a girl donkey, named Delphine. They also speak to each other on the telephone. Although Peppa speaks English and Delphine speaks French, they discover that they love lots of the same things.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep163
programme.desc: Switcheroo - When Froga and Anna realize they have switched mugs in the morning, they decide to make a day out of it and Switcheroo Day is born. Reversing roles, Froga will prepare lunch while Anna tends to Froga's strawberry plants.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep164
programme.desc: The Missing Socks - When Froga realizes her socks are smelly after a day of gardening, Bubu offers to help by placing them into his SMELL BETTER MACHINE. When the machine ends one of Froga's beloved socks has disappeared. She's worried it's gone forever.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep303
programme.desc: No Time Like The Present Store - At the Present Store, Joe's running a contest, whoever guesses the mystery present gets to unwrap it! What could be inside this special gift?! We'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep604
programme.desc: Pups Save the Honey / Pups Save Mayor Goodway's Purse - Yumi's Yummy Honey is all the buzz when it - and her beehive - go missing from her farm! // Mayor Goodway's purse has disappeared! Along with its precious cargo - Chickaletta!

programme.title: Paw Patrol S09 Ep908
programme.desc: Pups Save the Hatchlings - When Mayor Humdinger decides to make the world's biggest omelet, he accidentally orders the wrong kind of eggs - ones that hatch.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep205
programme.desc: The wig of power / The duck who parped wolf - Steel Tower is under new management not once but twice - can the Deer Squad return it to a distraught Sir Steel? // Steel and Lady Fluffpot are putting up a play. Ian's false alarms frustrate Kai, but one of them turns out to be a REAL emergency!

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep206
programme.desc: Satellite flight / Diamond geezer - Everyone is grooving to Stu and Safia's dance song, so the Deer has to stop Steel's satellite from broadcasting hypnotic dance signals. // To impress Lady Fluffpot, Sir Steel tries to get his hands on Jade's precious Rainbow Diamond!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep208
programme.desc: Paddington and the Caterpillar / The Floor is Lava - Paddington has a new caterpillar friend, and he and Judy learn that not all changes are bad! // The Browns take part in a very competitive game of The Floor is Lava but who will win and will they make a good impression on an important visitor?

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Cranberry Cookies - Tiny Chef bakes cookies to welcome a lady bug who moves into the neighborhood.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep619
programme.desc: Pups Save a White Wolf / Pups Save a Wrong Way Explorer - After a sudden snow storm, Everest cares for a wolf cub as they work together to help the PAW Patrol find them. // Famous wrong-way explorer, Travelling Travis accidentally takes Chickaletta to the North Pole where they run into some crocodiles?

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep620
programme.desc: Pups Save the Squirrels / Pups Save a Roo - The PAW Patrol is on a roll when squirrels stash acorns in Alex's treehouse causing it to fall onto Daring Danny's skateboard! // It's a switcheroo situation when a joey is separated from its mama. It's up to the pups to save a roo and the day!

programme.desc: The Spring Kick-off Games - Gran-Gran; Bossy is tired of losing at the Spring Kickoff Games.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep104

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep104

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep204
programme.desc: The Treat Goblin / Baby Super Shark - Goldie blames her missing treats on a monster. // Vigo's plan to turn everyfishy into babies backfires.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep203
programme.desc: A Tale of Two-más - It's Shipbuilding Day in Larimar and everyone pitches in, except Tomás who'd rather play music. While avoiding work, Tomás meets Pepito, a magic faun who offers to switch places and do his work for him.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep120
programme.desc: Cecilia and the Magic Rubies - Santi and crew go underwater to stop Escarlata la Pirata before she steals all the Magic Rubies from Giant Clam Reef!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep417

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep242

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep244

programme.title: The Numtums S1 Ep33
programme.desc: Gladdy's Secret Recipe - Gladdy is determined to win the treat competition using her secret recipe. But can the Numpups crack her secret code?

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep78
programme.desc: Up Down, Down Up - Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po drive the Tubby Car to the Hidey Hup where they discover the Tubby Uppy Downy. They have fun going up down, down up!

programme.title: Yakka Dee S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Whale - Dee encourages a friend to say 'whale' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! We meet lots of different whales. We see swimming whales, splashing whales and even a singing whale!

programme.title: Tinpo S1 Ep62
programme.desc: Get On Track - Mayor Sho-Po would like the team to build a shortcut through the Po Forest... without taking away any trees!

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S1 Ep9
programme.desc: It's time to grow a flower - JoJo tries to grow a daffodil but is disheartened to learn that it will take a long time to bloom. Cynthia and Gran Gran show JoJo how to take care of it and the best way to measure its growth.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep21
programme.desc: Never Mending Story - The Kazoops decide to replace their broken couch, but Monty doesn't think being broken makes something useless.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep20
programme.desc: Coconut Safari Club - Monty is surprised when his family tell him that Jimmy Jones can't appreciate music because he's an animal.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Fruit Bat - Not wanting to go to bed, Bluey tries to dream about being a nocturnal fruit bat so she can stay up all night long and soon finds herself flying through the night sky.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep29
programme.desc: The Favourite Badge - The Squirrels learn what a favourite is, but have trouble deciding what their own favourite things are, so they make a film asking some of their friends what is special to them to help narrow it down.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep28
programme.desc: The Round Up Badge - The Squirrels go on the trail of a lost herd of cattle with Duggee and his old pal Rodeo Horse, who teaches them how to be cowhands... and earn their Round Up Badges in the process!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep27
programme.desc: The Game Show Badge - The Squirrels have played all of their board games, so Duggee entertains them by putting on a Game Show, with some help hosting from his good friend Ladybug.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep2
programme.desc: Fatberg, London Sewers, England - While Lars, Kelly and Xuli go into the sewers to help keep London clean, Glitch and the Grimbots create some enormous blockages after flushing wet wipes down the toilet.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep1
programme.desc: Hollywood, USA - After winning a part in a Hollywood film, Glitch is not happy when he has to work with Kyan to finish a scene.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Bbq - It's lunchtime on Bluey's deck! But the BBQ needs a salad, so Bingo's relaxing sit-down will have to wait until she finds every colour of capsicum her cousins asked for!

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep6
programme.desc: The Weekend - At the weekend, Bluey and Bingo are playing in the garden with Dad. But Bingo gets upset when she discovers a walking leaf insect and Dad doesn't notice.

programme.title: Andy's Aquatic Adventures S1 Ep23
programme.desc: Andy and the Storm Petrel - Andy goes on an aquatic adventure to the Galapagos Islands in search of a storm petrel.

programme.title: My Pet and Me: Teeny Tiny Creatures S3 Ep3
programme.desc: Red Squirrels - Rory and Sandy search the forest for shy red squirrels. Chantelle meets a local expert.

programme.title: Swashbuckle S2 Ep3
programme.desc: The Scarlet Squid Clear Out - Gem enlists another four youngsters to help her reclaim her stolen jewels, and Captain Stinker finally becomes tired of the mess on board the Scarlet Squid.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep26
programme.desc: The Puddle Badge - Happy sets his sights on a very questionable looking puddle that he is determined to splash in, much to the horror of Duggee and the other Squirrels - and the tiny citizens of Midgetropolis who live inside it!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep25
programme.desc: The Biology Badge - Duggee and the Squirrels hop inside the Biology Bus and miniaturize themselves to go on a voyage of discovery inside Enid, to find out what's making her cough.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep24
programme.desc: The Taste Badge - Duggee is making a smoothie. The Squirrels can't agree on whether it's delicious or horrible, so they make their own adventurous smoothies showcasing their favourite flavours to discover what taste is.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep52
programme.desc: Sami Reindeer Herding, Norway - The Go Jetters are in snowy Norway to learn about the Sami reindeer. The reindeers are migrating and need to get a ferry to their warmer summer home.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep51
programme.desc: Ilulissat, Greenland - Grandmaster Glitch has travelled to Ilulissat in Greenland to show his teddy, Cuddles, the sights. But Cuddles ends up getting stuck in the snow!

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S14 Ep15
programme.desc: Thomas' Crazy Day - The Fat Controller enlists Thomas to teach the silly Misty Island Logging Locos; at the same time, Thomas promises to play hide-and-seek with Percy.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S2 Ep13
programme.desc: Shallot Circus - The Shallots have discovered acrobatics, and are inspired by the Ribbon Sisters to put on a show.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S2 Ep12
programme.desc: Origami Overload - John has a problem with the origami flamingos he has made and needs Sarah and Duck's help.

programme.title: Nelly and Nora S1 Ep21
programme.desc: The Train Runs Cold - Nelly and Nora try to figure out who made the tracks in the snow.

programme.title: Dog Loves Books S1 Ep29
programme.desc: Dog Loves King Arthur - Dog and Pug visit King Arthur in his castle, where he and his knights only shout at each other at their Long Table. With the help of Merlin they decide to change the table to a Round Table.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep19
programme.desc: Happy Ordinary Day - Monty is in the mood for celebrating and begins to wonder if you really can only celebrate big, special occasions.

programme.desc: Cut the Chisme - The family tries to stop their notorious chismoso Hector from gossiping all over town but can he stay quiet?

programme.title: Transformers: EarthSpark S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Moov-ing In - As the Malto family get used to its new members, Bumblebee quickly learns that his mission to train the Terrans won't be as easy as he thought.

programme.desc: SpongeBob LongPants / Larry’s Gym - SpongeBob gets a pair of long pants, but they change his life in unexpected ways. // When Larry the Lobster opens a new gym in Bikini Bottom, SpongeBob becomes his best customer.

programme.desc: The Fishbowl / Married to Money - Sandy tries to study SpongeBob and Patrick’s behavior, but her science experiment goes horribly awry. // Mr. Krabs takes Plankton’s advice, and finally marries the only thing he ever loved…money!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S09 Ep197
programme.desc: Mall Girl Pearl / Two Thumbs Down - Pearl gets a job to be cool like her friends, but the only store that’s hiring is the lamest store at the mall! // SpongeBob loses the use of his thumbs, and must get them back in working order before his entire life falls apart.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S09 Ep198
programme.desc: Sharks vs. Pods / CopyBob DittoPants - 'The Sharks' are the toughest guys in town, but their next confrontation might be too much for SpongeBob to handle. // Plankton clones SpongeBob in an effort to steal Krabs’ secret formula, but original Bob might ruin his plans.

programme.desc: Karate Chops / Taco The Town - Used to being top dog, Carl can't handle when Adelaide joins his karate class and becomes the star student. // Hector starts selling Rosa's delicious tacos but gets overwhelmed when they're more popular than the mercado!

programme.desc: Chancla Force / Fluff Love - Carl takes Rosa's chancla, setting off the balance of order in the city, & calling the Chancla Force into action! // Carlitos goes on a wild adventure to get his favorite stuffed animal from the arcade.

programme.desc: The Kid Plays in the Picture / Achy Breaky Art - Carl's love for toys gets him caught up in a whirlwind toy review career. // Frida's art gets a bad review, the kids try to stage a new auction to lift her spirits.

programme.desc: The Krusty Bucket / Squid's on a Bus - Plankton creates a clone of himself and Mr. Krabs, but neither restaurant is safe from the newcomer. // Squidward gleefully switches jobs with a bus driver for an easy ride... until SpongeBob and Patrick climb aboard.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep249
programme.desc: Sandy's Nutty Nieces / Insecurity Guards - SpongeBob gets in over his head when he volunteers to babysit Sandy's 3 nieces. // SpongeBob and Patrick volunteer as guards at the museum, while Squidward attempts to hang his painting unnoticed.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep250
programme.desc: Broken Alarm / Karen's Baby - SpongeBob breaks his precious alarm clock, but nothing else is loud enough to wake him up on time. // Karen quickly learns that kids grow up too fast after her new child arrives in the mail.

programme.desc: Shell Games / Senior Discount - Patrick discovers that the rock he lives under is actually a sea turtle who overslept. // Old Man Jenkins disrupts business as usual at the Krusty Krab, but Mr. Krabs can't find a way to kick him out.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S02 Ep203

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep216

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S02 Ep208
programme.desc: The Chase - As the kids are pursued relentlessly by a mysterious machine, their exhaustion puts them at each other's throats.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep307
programme.desc: King Me / Private and the Winky Factory - King Julien's archrival, Clemson, returns in another attempt to claim the lemur crown. // Private's favorite treat, the Peanut Butter Winky, is going the way of the dinosaur.

programme.desc: Best Foes / Night of the Vesuviuses - Kowalski invents an enemy detector but it doesn't work. programme.desc: Big Screen Buhdeuce / Weekend at Furfle's - Buhdeuce is lured away from Breadwinning by the glitz and glamour of being a movie star. // When Mrs. Furfle falls into a deep magical sleep, SwaySway and Buhdeuce pretend she's awake so she won't miss her big date with T-Midi.

programme.title: The Barbarian and the Troll S01 Ep107

programme.desc: Snappy Campers / Lucky Duck - Dudley and Kitty go undercover as campers at Camp Itchyowiebooboo to empede Snaptrap's "evil" plan. // Dudley's favorite TV host attempts to destroy television to avenge the cancellation of his show.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Strickland Vs. Magomedov
programme.desc: Prelims - After a spectacular UFC debut that saw him end Dustin Stoltzfus’ night in just 19 seconds, Abus Magomedov will step squarely into the main event spotlight on July 1 when he faces perennial middleweight contender Sean Strickland in the headliner of UFC Fight Night at the APEX in Las Vegas. A Top 10 stalwart fighting in his adopted hometown, Strickland has already won three UFC main events over Uriah Hall, Jack Hermansson and Nassourdine Imavov, and now he’ll look to halt the rise of Magomedov, who brings a three-fight winning streak into this intriguing bout.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Strickland Vs. Magomedov
